column8: He has a long snout, an acute sense of smell, and a barking, howling, or whining voice. He looks dangerous and hostile!

A small, mostly nocturnal tropical lizard, usually having toe pads that can cling to smooth surfaces.
A beetlelike insect with long antennae and legs, feeding by scavenging. Several tropical species have become established worldwide as pests in homes and food service establishments.
